definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to convert/to turn into (sth else)/to adapt (a story to another medium)
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to change (sth)/to alter (sth)/to change over (to sth else)
lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake/to accept an error and adapt to it/to muddle through
to get rid of/to exclude/to eliminate/to remove/to delete/to strip out/to extract
lit. to draw a dipper with a gourd as a model (idiom)/fig. to copy slavishly
lit. drawing a tiger using a cat as a model (idiom); fig. to follow a model and get things more or less right but without capturing the spirit of the subject/uninspired imitation
